children.comments:
Law: extend f <<< extend g = extend (f <<< extend g)
Proof:
First, rewrite in pointful form:
(extend f <<< extend g) x = extend (f <<< extend g) x
RHS := extend (f <<< extend g) x =
extend (\ y -> f (extend g y)) x =
extend (\ (y1, y2) -> f (extend g (y1, y2))) (x1, x2) =
extend (\ (y1, y2) -> f (y1, g (y1, y2))) (x1, x2) =
(x1, (\ (y1, y2) -> f (y1, g (y1, y2))) (x1, x2)) =
(x1, f (x1, g (x1, x2)))
LHS := (\ y -> extend f (extend g y)) x =
(\ (y1, y2) -> extend f (extend g (y1, y2))) (x1, x2) =
(\ (y1, y2) -> extend f (y1, g (y1, y2))) (x1, x2) =
(\ (y1, y2) -> (y1, f (y1, g (y1, y2)))) (x1, x2) =
(x1, f (x1, g (x1, x2)))
children.title: extendEnv

children.comments:
Law: extract <<= xs = xs
Proof:
LHS := extend extract xs =
extend extract (x1, x2) =
(x1, extract (x1, x2)) =
(x1, x2)
RHS := (x1, x2)
Law: extract (f <<= xs) = f xs
Proof:
LHS := extract (extend f xs) =
extract (extend f (x1, x2)) =
extract (x1, f (x1, x2)) =
f (x1, x2)
RHS := f (x1, x2)
children.title: comonadEnv

children.comments:
Law: extend f <<< extend g = extend (f <<< extend g)
Proof:
RHS := extend (\ x -> f (extend g x)) y =
extend (\ x -> f (extend g (sx, s))) (s'y, s') =
extend (\ x -> f (\ t -> g (sx, s), s)) (s'y, s') =
(\ t' -> (\ x -> f (\ t -> g (sx, s), s)) (s'y, s'), s')
LHS := (extend f <<< extend g) y =
extend f (extend g y) =
extend f (extend g (sy, s)) =
extend f (\ s' -> g (sy, s), s) =
(\ t -> f (\ s' -> g (sy, s), s) , s) =
TODO: finish this
children.title: extendStore

declarations.comments:
Law: peek (pos x) x = extract x
Proof:
RHS := extract (f, s) = f s
LHS := peek (pos (f, s)) (f, s) =
peek s (f, s) =
peek s (f, _) = f s
declarations.title: peek

declarations.comments:
Law: pos (extend _ x) = pos x
Proof:
RHS := pos (_, s)
LHS := pos (extend _ (f, s)) =
pos (extend _ (_, s)) =
pos (_, s)
declarations.title: pos

children.comments:
Law: extend f <<< extend g = extend (f <<< extend g)
Proof:
Rewrite pointfully:
(extend f <<< extend g) x = extend (f <<< extend g) x
LHS := extend f (extend g x) =
extend f (\ t -> g \ t' -> x (t <> t')) =
\ s -> f (\ s' -> (\ t -> g \ t' -> x (t <> t')) (s <> s')) =
\ s -> f (\ s' -> g \ t' -> x (s <> s' <> t'))
RHS := \ s -> (f <<< extend g) (\ s' -> x (s <> s')) =
\ s -> (\ y -> f (extend g y)) (\ s' -> x (s <> s')) =
\ s -> (\ y -> f (\ t -> g (\ t' -> y (t <> t')))) (\ s' -> x (s <> s')) =
\ s -> f (\ t -> g (\ t' -> (\ s' -> x (s <> s')) (t <> t'))) =
\ s -> f (\ t -> g (\ t' -> x (s <> t <> t'))) = (via renaming)
\ s -> f (\ s' -> g \ t' -> x (s <> s' <> t'))
children.title: extendTraced

children.comments:
Law: extract <<= xs = xs
Proof:
RHS := \ x -> s
LHS := extend extract (\ x -> s) =
\ t -> extract (\ t' -> (\ x -> s) (t <> t')) =
\ t -> (\ x -> s) (t <> mempty) =
\ t -> (\ x -> s) t =
\ x -> s
children.title: comonadTraced

declarations.comments:
Law: track mempty = extract
Proof:
First, rewrite as: track mempty f = extract f
RHS := f mempty
LHS := f mempty
Law: (track s =<= track t) x = track (s <> t) x
Proof:
RHS := track (s <> t) x = x (s <> t)
LHS := composeCoKliesliFlipped (track s) (track t) x =
track s (track t <<= x) =
track s (extend (track t) x) =
track s (\ t' -> (track t) \ t'' -> x (t' <> t'')) =
track s (\ t' -> x (t' <> t)) =
x (s <> t)
declarations.title: track
